task.title: Specifying Path to Additional Plugins Directory

context.p: In addition to plugins located at sernaInstallationPath\plugins, the user can place plugins for Serna in some other directory. For example, it can be useful to put plugins somewhere on a shared file system or a separate disk that survives reinstalling.
To specify the path to an additional directory with plugins for Serna, do the following:

info.p: To call up the Preferences Dialog, choose Tools Preferences .

step.cmd: Specify the path to the additional plugins directory.

info.p: In the Path to additional plugins directory field, type the path. Or you can click the Browse button and select a directory in the Browse For Folder Dialog.

step.cmd: Click the Apply button to apply the settings.
Click the Close button to close the dialog.
